thread.section_title: LiftMode Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LiftMode | liftmode.com
thread.title: Daniella VanVliet

author: Daniella VanVliet
title: Daniella VanVliet
text:
My boyfriend and I could no longer stand drinking coffee as it is harsh on the stomach. This saved us! My boyfriend loves being able to wake up and take a Liftmode right when his alarm goes off rather than spend 10 minutes making coffee. The L-Theanine mix is fantastic, we never get that caffeine jitter!
Ordering our third batch of 300 right after this!
